hero.title: Discipline Is Engineered — Not Assumed.
hero.subtitle: Defined Structure. Validated Conditions. Controlled Risk. A rule-based Bitcoin framework built to operate consistently across market cycles.
story.title: Why Structure Became Non-Negotiable
story.subtitle: Across multiple Bitcoin market cycles — from aggressive expansion phases to prolonged drawdowns — discretionary decision-making repeatedly revealed its limits. Flexibility without structure turns into inconsistency. Market noise influences perception. Emotions distort timing. Hindsight reshapes judgment. The recurring pattern was clear: sustainable performance does not come from better prediction. It comes from predefined process. The framework was developed as a response to that realization — to standardize decisions, eliminate subjective overrides, and operate independently of emotional interference.
context.title: Most Systems Are Built to Impress.
context.subtitle: The crypto trading space is saturated with aggressive optimization, short-term performance screenshots, and opaque signal services. Many systems are engineered to look exceptional in isolated periods — but lack structural resilience across changing volatility regimes. This framework was not designed to maximize trade frequency or produce unrealistic short-term spikes. It was designed to remain structurally intact under different market environments.
framework.title: A Defined Rule System — Not a Black Box
framework.subtitle: The framework operates directly within TradingView and follows a transparent protocol. It evaluates objective market structure, validates predefined conditions, and executes trades strictly according to structured risk parameters. No outsourced signal logic. No AI mystification. No discretionary overrides.

methodology.subtitle: The system evaluates price behavior directly — not narrative. The objective is not constant activity, but conditional engagement when structure and probability align.

risk.title: Built to Survive Volatility.
risk.subtitle: Return is the outcome. Risk control is the foundation. The framework prioritizes capital protection over aggressive growth targets. Structured safeguards limit drawdowns, reduce exposure during unstable phases, and prevent uncontrolled position sizing. Long-term consistency requires structural defense before offensive positioning.

transparency.title: Founder-Led. Directly Responsible.
transparency.description: AmendLogic is developed and maintained under direct founder oversight. There are no anonymous development teams, no outsourced signal providers, and no affiliate-driven marketing narratives. The framework is continuously evaluated across market conditions with a focus on structural integrity rather than promotional performance metrics. Offering a rule-based system means standing behind its methodology — transparently and responsibly.
